entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WildcardPathSegment does not properly honor provided StringComparison #68942
  • System.IO.FileStream.Lock ApiCompat issues #68939
  • [API Proposal]: Remove setter of Capacity Property in the BoundedChannelOptions class #68936
  • LLVM AOT cross-compile CoreCLR tests fail in all PR #68932
  • Addressing security vulnerability in System.Text.Json 4.X version #68931
  • AggregateException.ToString() should not duplicate inner message exception #68930
  • [debugger] CORDBG_E_MISSING_METADATA error when inspecting EF Core classes in .Net 6 #68929
  • Mono work necessary to support IL-based invoke #68928
    7.0.0
  • fx_ver::parse SIGABRTs on Mac with new toolset update #68927
    7.0.0
  • Extend System.Runtime.InteropServices.CLong and CULong to match nfloat #68926
    7.0.0
  • Consider hiding stack frames when using Invoke #68923
    7.0.0
  • Update `INS_serialize` perfscore with accurate numbers. #68917
    7.0.0
  • Add `X86Serialize` API and intrinsic for mono. #68916
  • AOT+LLVM throws for `Enum.GetUnderlyingType()` on Android in .NET 7 #68914
  • X509Certificates failures in outer loop on CentOS 9 #68911
  • Switch expression in C# 8 behaves differently on x86 vs x64 android #68906
    7.0.0
  • Mono JIT: Wrong stack size calculation of basic blocks #68905
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: [QUIC] QuicConnection #68902
  • Cache-Control parsing differs from other headers #68901
    Future
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.IO.Tests.Perf_File #68915
  • [Android][iOS] Enable HttpClientHandler.DangerousAcceptAnyServerCertificateValidator when using native handlers #68898
  • [API Proposal]: Add property to ZipArchiveEntry to indicate if the entry is encrypted #68897
    7.0.0
  • dotnet watch Console.ReadLine() does not read first key stroke #68909
  • System.Text.Json does not fill JsonExtensionData when a property with the same name already exists or has the JsonIgnoreAttribute #68895
  • [NativeAOT] SemaphoreSlim.ReleaseWaitAsync benchmarks are slower on Windows #68894
  • CertGetCertificateChain memory leak in pure Windows 7 system #68892
  • [NativeAOT] ConcurrentDictionary is slower #68891
  • JIT does not inline operators against generic math #68890
  • [NativeAOT] Not using ICU on Windows by default #68889
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/tailcall_v4/hijacking/hijacking.cmd #68884
  • Test failure Interop\\COM\\NETClients\\Primitives\\NETClientPrimitivesInALC\\NETClientPrimitivesInALC.cmd #68880

Closed

  • FileSystemEventArgs.FullPath does not return a fully qualified path #62606
    7.0.0
  • macOS / Mac Catalyst / iOS: CurrentThread.Current[UI]Culture is always the invariant culture #68321
    6.0.x
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Rsa.Tests.EncryptDecrypt_Array.RsaCryptRoundtrip_OaepSHA1 test failure #68590
  • CI: wasm.build.tests.satelliteassembliestests.resourcesfrommainassembly CI failure on Linux #68773
  • Assert failure: `!pFlat->HasReadyToRunHeader()` #68654
    7.0.0
  • SetYieldProcessorScalingFactor needs to change to adapt to the new periodical measurements #68839
    7.0.0
  • runtime-extra-platforms rolling build failure: Docker Internal Server Error - The container operating system does not match the host operating system. #67728
  • Downlevel (out-of-band nuget) version of System.Memory / ReadOnlySequence<T> doesn't work correctly with custom memory-managers #67295
  • Running dotnet test in libraries failing to execute net462 targets #68384
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\Arrays\\huge\\huge_i4_il_r\\huge_i4_il_r.cmd #65819
    7.0.0
  • FileStream.Lock(Int64, Int64) always fails on FreeBSD #65831
    7.0.0
  • Tiered Compilation turns a static readonly value into a constant, ignoring changes made to the value via generated IL #68912
  • Building .NET 6 Blazor WebAssembly applications with .NET 7 SDK leads to errors and warnings #68896
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandlerTest_Http3_MsQuic.Public_Interop_ExactVersion_Success(uri: \"https://www.litespeedtech.com/\") #68692
    7.0.0
  • Support for HTTPS proxy #68416
    7.0.0
  • MutualTLS authentication in C# for httpclient #68070
  • [Mono] Clean up the function calls #66525
    7.0.0
  • Multiple calls of QuicConnection.CloseAsync lead to Debug.Assert #56851
    7.0.0
  • Susessful Build #68903
  • [API Proposal]: Add non-allocating overload of JsonEncodedText.Encode that allows the caller to own the memory #68747
  • [API Proposal]: AssemblyLoadContext.MixedAssemblyLoadContextFactory #62754
  • [QUIC] IPv6 addresses don't work on Linux #67301
  • System.Text.Json source generator crashes when processing unresolved symbols #68072
    7.0.0
  • Test failrue JIT\\Directed\\nullabletypes\\Desktop\\boxunboxvaluetype_ro\\boxunboxvaluetype_ro.cmd #68882
  • [QUIC] Adopt msquic generated interop layer #67377
    7.0.0
  • ExecutionEngineException using SpanDebugView #56703
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Move APIs for generated marshalling to different namespace - System.Runtime.Marshalling #68248
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexCultureTests.TestIgnoreCaseRelationBorderCasesInNonBacktracking(options: NonBacktracking) #60753
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix ProfileOptimization test #68943
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Update ApiCompat to exclude UnsupportedOSPlatform["freebsd"] on Lock/Unlock #68941
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Revert "[QUIC] Adopted msquic generated interop" #68940
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix double-validation in BoundedChannelOptions #68938
    area-System.Threading.Channels
  • Call simpler overloads of Substring and Slice #68937
    area-Meta
  • Fix System.Collections.Immutable version in ILCompiler.Build.Tasks #68935
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Detect the default locale name during startup on Apple platforms #68934
    area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • System.Diagnostics.ActivityLink/ActivityEvent: Implement EnumerateTagObjects API #68933
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] add RID for Alpine 3.16 #68925
    area-Meta
  • Reenable win-arm64 runtime tests on PRs #68922
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Reenable `System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.Tests` #68921
    arch-wasm, area-Serialization, disabled-test
  • Enable dumping of R2R manifest metadata from ildasm #68920
    area-ILTools-coreclr, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • WIP: Cross module work #68919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • PoC: retire internal SocketExceptionFactory #68918
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] Docker fixes for the enterprise linux testing pipeline #68913
    area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • [MONO][TEST] Disabled k-nucleotide test on mono #68910
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Display parents' members on GetProperties. #68907
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Experimental - add system.runtime tests to aot #68904
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update libunwind to latest #68899
    area-PAL-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Rename CoreRT to NativeAOT (1/N) #68888
    area-Meta
  • Add Mac ARM64 coverage to runtime-dev-innerloop #68886
  • Always morph GT_MOD for ARM64 #68885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Revert FileSystemEventArgs/RenamedEventArgs FullPath/OldFullPath changes #68883
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Preserve FirstChanceExceptionEventArgs ctor #68265
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.6
  • Use more char.Is helpers from RegexCompiler / source generator #68924
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Detect the default locale name during startup on Apple platforms #68706
    area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x
  • Do not fold relocatable constants into displacements #68851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix VSTest and dotnet test broken on .NETFramework #68863
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix for FileStream.Lock(Int64, Int64) always fails on FreeBSD #65831 #68908
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • add RID for Alpine 3.16 #68505
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Fix passing too small args for PUTARG_STK on macOS arm64 ABI #68113
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.6
  • [release/6.0] Do not reset assigned interval twice #68327
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.6
  • [release/6.0] Fix JIT using too wide indirections when returning small structs #68379
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.6
  • [release/6.0] Unloadability bugs fixes #68674
    Servicing-approved, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 6.0.6
  • [release/6.0] Fixed the yp_spin_count_unit to be a factor of the original_spin_count_unit rather than a continually increasing value #68881
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 6.0.6
  • Tweak Regex comparison to improve subsequent bounds check removals #68846
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Fix a few more API compat inconsistencies #68834
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Annotating System.Text.Json library for aot form factor #68464
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add test for multiple calls of QuicConnection.CloseAsync #68893
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1753679 #68870
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm][debugger] Refactor of getProperties mechanism #68486
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Use Docker images from mcr.microsoft.com in EnterpriseTests #68875
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Replace invalid sourcegen debug assertion with runtime check #68828
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Adopted msquic generated interop #68288
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fixed the yp_spin_count_unit to be a factor of the original_spin_count_unit rather than a continually increasing value #68879
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Improving the 64-bit number formatting to better match the 32-bit algorithm #68795
    area-System.Numerics
  • Update message for unsupported char marshalling #68865
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Add a four-element AsyncLocalValueMap type #68790
    area-System.Threading, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Disable ZipFile_Unix.UnixCreateSetsPermissionsInExternalAttributes on Apple OSs #68867
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Stop escaping ' and " in generated regex XML comments #68856
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Move `CustomTypeMarshaller` APIs to `System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshalling` #68842
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Delete stale IgnoreCaseRelation regex tests #68857
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0

Updated

  • [wasm] First attempt at a wasm app host #68696
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix ProcessorCount calculation on Windows 11 #68639
    area-System.Threading
  • [WIP] GetTotalPauseDuration implementation #68835
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update debpkg container image to ubuntu 18 #68351
    area-Infrastructure-installer, community-contribution
  • [mono][eventpipe] Implementing MethodDetails and BulkType events #68571
    area-Tracing-mono
  • Deprecate ICU ucol_safeClone and support ucol_clone #68847
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Globalization, 7.0.0
  • Treat System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe as intrinsic #68739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Arm64 PGO Builds #66867
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • ConfigurationBinder handles ISet<> #68133
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Remove the pid argument on Windows createdump only take dumps of the parent process #68877
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Loop alignment: Fix loop size calculation to exclude IG's size that are marked as not aligned #68869
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplify `fgMorphMultiregStructArg` #68853
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Search native code in all R2R images in version bubble #68607
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() and friends #67917
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Updating Complex to implement INumberBase and ISignedNumber #68612
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Adding support for vector constants via GenTreeVecCon #68874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize bswap+mov to movbe on xarch #66965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add tiering within interpreter #68823
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add X86Serialize hardware intrinsic. #68677
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Update generators.targets #68860
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [eventpipe] Fix environment variable parser for multiple configurations #68552
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • 49936 text json failures #68758
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Throw from MsQuicImplementationProvider if not supported. #68833
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • WIP: Use csel for conditional moves #67894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Merge several version of MsQuicStream SendAsync code #68772
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Physical value numbering #68712
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not discard byref zeros in `native int + byref` additions #68086
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Detect truncated GZip streams #61768
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • Add basic fake NTLM server to test NTAuthentication round-trip scenarios #65611
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Apply changes from #63356 #68864
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [zlib] Bump to upstream 1.2.12 #68219
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO.Compression
  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
